name: Psalms (CJACeNTRaL)
description:
Beneath the radiation-soaked ruins of Chernobyl lies a sinister threat to humanity, and the only hope to defeat this new evil is in the hands of one man. Armed only with the full armor of God, and a single revolver, he will embark to cleanse his land of the wretched heretics and the evils that they’ve summoned in a bloody crusade not to bring peace, but a hail of bullets.

Disclaimer: This is supposed to be a university exam type thing so right now its full of bugs, treat it as a test for what is coming next.
